title: Montaigne releases new song Clip My Wings and tour, reminds everyone she is amazing
text:
Montaigne releases new song Clip My Wings and tour, reminds everyone she is amazing
Wunderkind Montaigne has released a new single Clip My Wings. Following on from her debut EP Life of Montaigne last year, Clip My Wings continues to see the young artist flex her incredible vocal talent and emotive songwriting.
Speaking of the single, Montaigne (otherwise known as Jessica Cerro) explained Clip My Wings “Is about attempting to push back against your oppressors. It is about subtle manipulation, it’s about outsiders and people you love doubting that what you’re going through is actually that bad because it’s so invisible, and it’s about wanting to expose that injustice“.
[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/220778632″ params=”auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /]
Following the release of the single Montaigne has released a run of shows for October.
